short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change many words in your browser to confuse friends, family, the boss, or anyone who has this installed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is made as a prank/joke installation for those who want to mess with friends, family, your boss, or maybe even yourself (is that possible?). TrumpFun changes random strings of text on a webpage according to the amount you select via options. (Some, Half, Most, All) and replaces them with "Donald Trump".

See your victim suffer as everything he/she loads, Facebook, Twitter, Google, & more - will be invested with Trump.
